step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap the top layer and choose Add Fade from the & menu.=Tap the top layer and choose Add Fade from the & menu.
$$$/Tutorial/Drag the top gradient handle down to the edge of the clouds.=Drag the top gradient handle down to the edge of the clouds.

$$$/Tutorial/Tap the Edit Gradient button. Adjust the fade opacity by dragging the gradient stops. Tap Done.=Tap the Edit Gradient button. Adjust the fade opacity by dragging the gradient stops. Tap Done.
$$$/Tutorial/Select the background layer and choose Adjustments > Color Balance.=Select the background layer and choose Adjustments > Color Balance.
$$$/Tutorial/To match the top layer’s light quality, increase the Red value by about 10%. Tap Apply.=To match the top layer’s light quality, increase the Red value by about 10%. Tap Apply.
